dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		ManufacturerProductCode as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(18,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		SourceFileName as string,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad
